0.name: Crash Test
0.predictiontext: The next area you create will crash.

1.name: Delay Test
1.predictiontext: The next area you create will stall for 10 seconds.

2.name: Delay and Crash Test
2.predictiontext: The next area you create will stall for 10 seconds then crash.

3.name: The Queen's Vaults
3.predictiontext: You will slay Atziri, Queen of the Vaal, and gain access to her Vaults.
3.flavourtext: The Red Queen holds the key to her vaults, and only death will loosen her grip.

4.name: The Singular Spirit
4.predictiontext: You will slay a Tormented spirit that carries a unique item.
4.flavourtext: A life spent fleeing from the law leaves the spirit ready to escape with its newfound treasure.

5.name: The Wealthy Exile
5.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile who wears only rare items.
5.flavourtext: They flee from the eyes of Oriath, coated in gold from head to toe.

6.name: The Scout
6.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile, who calls forth a Warband.
6.flavourtext: One like you roams the land, but they are just the first of many.

7.name: Waiting in Ambush
7.predictiontext: You will be attacked by a Rogue Exile when opening a Strongbox.
7.flavourtext: A chest of goods hides many challenges, but one goes unseen even to the wise.

8.name: The Alchemist
8.predictiontext: You will slay an Undying Alchemist, and it will drop an Orb of Alchemy.
8.flavourtext: A fool tries to turn lead to gold, but a deft hand takes it by force.

9.name: A Regal Death
9.predictiontext: You will slay a very powerful king or queen, and it will drop a Regal Orb.
9.flavourtext: Blue blood drains from a cut-throat, and turns what it touches to gold.

10.name: The Corrupt
10.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful enemy in a Vaal side area and it will drop a Vaal Orb.
10.flavourtext: To plow a field, you need a tool. To harvest grain, you need a tool. To spread corruption, you need a tool.

11.name: The Emperor's Trove
11.predictiontext: You will slay Izaro and he will drop an extra Treasure Key.
11.flavourtext: Lost in his own creation, the Emperor leaves a generous parting gift for the precise.

12.name: Nemesis of Greed
12.predictiontext: You will slay a rare but powerful foe who then drops two unique items instead of one.
12.flavourtext: A collector of antiquities doubles their treasures, relinquishing them only with their final breath.

13.name: SHOULD NOT APPEAR
13.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful monster, and it will drop a unique item once slain.

14.name: The Blacksmith
14.predictiontext: You will slay Hillock and he will drop a powerful item.
14.flavourtext: Long ago, a master of metal, now a shaper of fear. But his greatest tools remain.

15.name: Forceful Exorcism
15.predictiontext: You will kill a foe possessed by a Tormented Spirit, freeing the spirit.
15.flavourtext: A pained spirit hijacks a body, and will not be stopped by that body's demise.

16.name: The Dreamer's Dream
16.predictiontext: You will enter a certain map, and when you slay the very powerful foe that has made it its home, it will drop a rare map.
16.flavourtext: The greatest threat, deep in dream, holds the key to another world.

17.name: The Aesthete's Spirit
17.predictiontext: You will find the tormented spirit of Shavronne near Brutus. You will slay Brutus while he is possessed by her spirit.
17.flavourtext: The echo of the Aesthete haunts her greatest creation, bestowing great powers once more.

18.name: Brothers in Arms
18.predictiontext: You will encounter Brutus and Kole deep in Axiom Prison, and slay them both.
18.flavourtext: Two men, transformed into monsters, fight together to hold the gate.

19.name: Echoes of Witchcraft
19.predictiontext: You will travel to the stone circle in the Western Forest, and destroy the Echo of Doedre Darktongue who waits there.
19.flavourtext: A circle of silent giants imprisons a memory of undying misery. A dark tongue whispers dark words carried by the western winds.

20.name: The God of Misfortune
20.predictiontext: You will destroy the false idols Kuduku and Kadaka
20.flavourtext: Pagan mouths worship pagan gods; false idols for false promises.

21.name: Echoes of Mutation
21.predictiontext: You will find the Echo of Maligaro in the Chamber of Sins and destroy it.
21.flavourtext: Perverse loyalty, blind love, the abuser and the abused reunited in sin.

22.name: Echoes of Lost Love
22.predictiontext: You will find the Echo of Daresso in the Cavern of Anger and destroy it.
22.flavourtext: Twisted by temptation, tempted by corruption, the Siren's song finally calls forth a fragment of her lost love.

23.name: A Master Seeks Help
23.predictiontext: You will find Haku and complete his mission. He will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
23.flavourtext: Carried by the southern winds, a master of metal seeks aid.

24.name: A Master Seeks Help
24.predictiontext: You will find Tora and complete her mission. She will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
24.flavourtext: Smelling of beast and blood, a master hunter seeks aid.

25.name: A Master Seeks Help
25.predictiontext: You will find Catarina and complete her mission. She will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
25.flavourtext: Guarding a sculpture of flesh and bone and magic, a master of necromancy seeks aid.

26.name: A Master Seeks Help
26.predictiontext: You will find Vagan and complete his mission. He will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
26.flavourtext: Forged in battle, stewing in arrogance, a master of weapons seeks aid.

27.name: A Master Seeks Help
27.predictiontext: You will find Elreon and complete his mission. He will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
27.flavourtext: Forsaken by the light he has sworn to protect, a master of prayer seeks aid.

28.name: A Master Seeks Help
28.predictiontext: You will find Vorici and complete his mission. He will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
28.flavourtext: Turning life to death, turning death to art, a master of the darkness seeks aid.

29.name: A Master Seeks Help
29.predictiontext: You will find Zana and complete her mission. She will reward you with extra reputation and favour.
29.flavourtext: Lost in the miasma of dream, a master of many realms seeks aid.

30.name: Hidden Vaal Pathways
30.predictiontext: You will enter a hidden Vaal area that contains powerful enemies.
30.flavourtext: Ancient foes open new paths to the land they left barren.

31.name: The Undead Brutes
31.predictiontext: You will seek out and destroy a group of seven powerful undead.
31.flavourtext: Powerful soldiers of a forgotten time reunite and march once again.

32.name: The Four Feral Exiles
32.predictiontext: You will enter a map that holds four additional Rogue Exiles.
32.flavourtext: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

33.name: Risen Blood
33.predictiontext: You will kill a powerful monster, whose blood takes on a new form.
33.flavourtext: Life flows through the blood. Let slip the blood, and the life will continue in a new form.

34.name: The Mysterious Gift
34.predictiontext: You will trade five unique items with a vendor.
34.flavourtext: A merchant seeks to trade misfitting gifts. Five for one, but what is the one?

35.name: A Valuable Combination
35.predictiontext: You will receive an extra Chaos Orb from a vendor when you trade items that would result in a Chaos Orb.
35.flavourtext: When the sum is already greater than the parts, there is room to make it greater still.

36.name: Fated Connections
36.predictiontext: You will create a fully-linked six-socket item using only Jeweller's Orbs.
36.flavourtext: Five and fewer stand alone, but six draws them together.

37.name: Trash to Treasure
37.predictiontext: You will turn a normal item into a unique item with a single Chance Orb.
37.flavourtext: A blank canvass holds untold potential, but the artist's fortunate hand transforms it into a masterpiece.

38.name: The Jeweller's Touch
38.predictiontext: You will create a fully-linked five-socket item with a single Jeweller's Orb
38.flavourtext: The Jeweller leaves five fingerprints and connects them with a single thread.

39.name: A Gracious Master
39.predictiontext: You will complete a Master's mission and will receive triple reputation and favour.
39.flavourtext: A desperate ally seeks your aid, and will lavish you with appreciation.

40.name: Erasmus' Gift
40.predictiontext: You will discover a 20% quality gem.
40.flavourtext: The kind gemcutter scattered his beautiful craft for the paupers, but greedy hands hide them.

41.name: The King's Path
41.predictiontext: You will defeat Kaom while wearing Kaom's Sign.
41.flavourtext: Madness feeds the King's fury in the raging mouth of the volcano. His last vision will be a sign.

42.name: The Karui Rebellion
42.predictiontext: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while wearing Karui Ward.
42.flavourtext: Thaumaturgy and faith clash among giant ruins; a recreation of a long-gone rebellion.

43.name: The King and the Brambles
43.predictiontext: You will defeat Daresso while wearing Bramblejack.
43.flavourtext: The Blade King's blood feeds brambles that grow ever thicker.

44.name: The Flow of Energy
44.predictiontext: You will defeat Shavronne while wearing Shavronne's Pace.
44.flavourtext: The Aesthete sustains herself in unnatural ways. When movement fails, energy flows.

45.name: The Bowstring's Music
45.predictiontext: You will defeat Nightwane while wielding Death's Harp.
45.flavourtext: The brittle archer's bow plays a song of death, but the harp sings a sweet masterpiece.

46.name: From The Void
46.predictiontext: You will defeat Bameth while wearing Blackheart.
46.flavourtext: The iron heart, burned in the blackness of the void that lies beyond sight, rots all it touches.

47.name: Heavy Blows
47.predictiontext: You will defeat Gneiss while wearing Craghead
47.flavourtext: Living stone strides across the field, each step shakes the earth and rattles the soul.

48.name: Fire and Brimstone
48.predictiontext: You will defeat Hatebeat while wearing Blackgleam.
48.flavourtext: Living cinders set the stone alight, a gleaming signal in the blackness where husks are burned.

49.name: A Forest of False Idols
49.predictiontext: You will defeat Torchoak Grove while wearing Araku Tiki.
49.flavourtext: A grove of wooden faces spit fire, a cheap mockery of unimaginable power.

50.name: Fire and Ice
50.predictiontext: You will defeat Hailrake while wearing Hrimsorrow.
50.flavourtext: Cold sorrow turns to burning fury that hails across the shattered ship.

51.name: Pleasure and Pain
51.predictiontext: You will defeat Shavronne while wearing Crown of Thorns.
51.flavourtext: A single thorn slips through stretched skin; pain turns to power.

52.name: The Bloody Flowers Redux
52.predictiontext: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while wearing Ezomyte Peak
52.flavourtext: Ezomyte banners flutter through the air as embellished monsters fall, a reenactment of the slave's final victory.

53.name: Dying Cry
53.predictiontext: You will defeat General Gravicius while wearing Deidbell.
53.flavourtext: The bell tolls, the people gather, the General is executed. The militia cries out and charges forth.

54.name: Mouth of Horrors
54.predictiontext: You will defeat Doedre while wielding Chalice of Horrors.
54.flavourtext: The vile witch whispers words of horror, and sups from the chalice one final time.

55.name: Nature's Resilience
55.predictiontext: You will defeat Calaf, Headstaver while wielding Springleaf.
55.flavourtext: Thieves camp beneath roadside trees, but it is their leader who falls like the mighty oak.

56.name: The Snuffed Flame
56.predictiontext: You will defeat Chatters while wielding Kaltenhalt.
56.flavourtext: Cold bones rattle in stone cells, extinguishing all light, all warmth, all hope.

57.name: The Apex Predator
57.predictiontext: You will defeat the Hundred Foot Shadow while wielding Screaming Eagle.
57.flavourtext: The eagle battles the vulture in the shadow of a dying sun, and becomes something greater.

58.name: Severed Limbs
58.predictiontext: You will defeat Hammerstorm while wielding Limbsplit.
58.flavourtext: A storm of stone stops when the last of the limbs are severed and blood flows no more.

59.name: Ancient Doom
59.predictiontext: You will defeat the Vaal Oversoul while wielding Doomfletch.
59.flavourtext: Doom grows at the apex of the pyramid.

60.name: The Silverwood
60.predictiontext: You will defeat Targa, Beast Poacher while wielding Silverbranch.
60.flavourtext: A thief, bow in hand, flees to the wooded outskirts.

61.name: The Servant's Heart
61.predictiontext: You will defeat Fidelitas while wielding Storm Cloud.
61.flavourtext: The Servant's sacrifice summons a storm in the Prodigy's soul.

62.name: Winter's Mournful Melodies
62.predictiontext: You will defeat Soulmourn while wielding Hrimnor's Hymn
62.flavourtext: A mournful hymn, a mournful soul, the chill of death on the wind.

63.name: Power Magnified
63.predictiontext: You will defeat Piety while wielding Reverberation Rod
63.flavourtext: The pious grow powerful surrounded by a sea of blood and empty husks

64.name: The Beginning and the End
64.predictiontext: You will defeat Archbishop Geofri while wielding Realmshaper.
64.flavourtext: The archbishop plays witness to his own cold death and cremation.

65.name: The Misunderstood Queen
65.predictiontext: You will defeat the Bone Queen while wielding Queen's Decree.
65.flavourtext: A queen of bone raises an army and flees among walls of flesh.

66.name: SHOULD NOT APPEAR
66.predictiontext: All normal monsters in area become magic - NOTE: Currently very laggy, do not enable

67.name: The Black Stone I
67.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an Onyx Amulet, applying elemental resistances.
67.flavourtext: The black stone senses resilience in you. It too grows resilient to outside influences.

68.name: The Black Stone II
68.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Augmentation on the Onyx Amulet, applying life.
68.flavourtext: The black stone senses the joy of life in you. It feeds on this joy and grows more lively.

69.name: The Black Stone III
69.predictiontext: You will use a Regal Orb on the Onyx Amulet, applying critical strike chance.
69.flavourtext: The black stone senses eagerness in you. It longs for the excitement of combat, of bloodshed.

70.name: The Black Stone IV
70.predictiontext: You will use an Exalted Orb on the Onyx Amulet, turning it into a powerful new item.
70.flavourtext: The black stone learns from you. It is ready to shape each encounter in your favour.

71.name: The Walking Mountain
71.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ruined Titan who will drop a unique item when slain.
71.flavourtext: Shaped by magic, the tool that breathes life into the titan's stone lies at its heart.

72.name: The Prison Guard
72.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Axiom Thunderguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
72.flavourtext: Clad in black, the guard holds the key to unleashing the storm.

73.name: The Sword King's Passion
73.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator who will drop a unique item when slain.
73.flavourtext: Once a challenger to the crown, he holds in his hands the Sword King's blade.

74.name: The Eagle's Cry
74.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Murk Runner who will drop a unique item when slain.
74.flavourtext: A flightless fowl charges through rotten wooden ribs; its scream gives even the battle-hardened pause.

75.name: From Death Springs Life
75.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead who will drop a unique item when slain.
75.flavourtext: Fetid waters carry the dead downstream, but walking in the mud, the dead one carries life.

76.name: Storm on the Horizon
76.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Brittle Poacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
76.flavourtext: The poacher's bowstring snaps like dry bone and crackles like thunder.

77.name: A Firm Foothold
77.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Seething Brine who will drop a unique item when slain.
77.flavourtext: Water slicks the stone, a misstep chills the bone, the living pools hold the cure.

78.name: The Ward's Ward
78.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bearded Shaman who will drop a unique item when slain.
78.flavourtext: The false shaman's death uncovers ancestral allurement locked in ancient stone.

79.name: Fear's Wide Reach
79.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Devourer who will drop a unique item when slain.
79.flavourtext: The unseen enemy travels through unseen tunnels. Its reach is small, but its effect is large.

80.name: The Prison Key
80.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bearded Devil who will drop a unique item when slain.
80.flavourtext: The gate is unlocked, but the key remains in the hands of a devil.

81.name: Roth's Legacy
81.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Oak's Devoted who will drop a unique item when slain.
81.flavourtext: The devotee holds a relic of the pirate's past, looted and lost for an age.

82.name: The Soulless Beast
82.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ancient Construct who will drop a unique item when slain.
82.flavourtext: Powered by twin wings, the mechanical monster roams the ruins.

83.name: The Sinner's Stone
83.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Sin Lord who will drop a unique item when slain.
83.flavourtext: A lord of sin roams hollow halls protected from the spells he sings.

84.name: Baptism by Death
84.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Death Bishop who will drop a unique item when slain.
84.flavourtext: The bishop's flock is long gone, yet still he wields his hefty crook.

85.name: The Lady in Black
85.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Arcmage who will drop a unique item when slain.
85.flavourtext: Lightning's hum grows louder and louder in the hands of the lady in black.

86.name: Against the Tide
86.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dockhand Wraith who will drop a unique item when slain.
86.flavourtext: Taken by the fickle tides, the Captain's bow washes against the dock from which he set sail.

87.name: The Brutal Enforcer
87.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Elite who will drop a unique item when slain.
87.flavourtext: In a society that values violence, the violent rise through the ranks like oil through water.

88.name: Graceful Flames
88.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Flame Sentinel who will drop a unique item when slain.
88.flavourtext: Crimson fabric flutters with fury and flame, but a gilded prize lies within.

89.name: Storm on the Reef
89.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Brine Vassal who will drop a unique item when slain.
89.flavourtext: Lightning flashes overhead. Bloated bodies wash ashore. One stands, walks, and stretches its wing.

90.name: The Petrified
90.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Pocked Lanternbearer who will drop a unique item when slain.
90.flavourtext: Lightless halls hewn in stone swell with the malformed, the twisted, the hardened and the dangerous.

91.name: The Vanguard
91.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Voll's Vanguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
91.flavourtext: The Vanguard lead the funereal march, playing hymns of death with their bowstrings.

92.name: Cleanser of Sins
92.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Undying Evangelist who will drop a unique item when slain.
92.flavourtext: The Evangelist does not practise what he preaches, but death wipes clean the slate.

93.name: Strong as a Bull
93.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Fighting Bull who will drop a unique item when slain.
93.flavourtext: Strength to rival the Karui King charges through the Sword King's dream.

94.name: The Lost Undying
94.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Skulking Dweller who will drop a unique item when slain.
94.flavourtext: Trapped with his emperor when the crown was taken, he seeks to change his fate.

95.name: A Whispered Prayer
95.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Frost Preacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
95.flavourtext: A preacher whispers to the skies and the skies answer with a blanket of biting frost.

96.name: The Last Watch
96.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ancient Archer who will drop a unique item when slain.
96.flavourtext: A loyal soldier in life, he stands watch, bow in hand, waiting to be sent to the Mother of death.

97.name: A Prodigious Hand
97.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Sutured Aberration who will drop a unique item when slain.
97.flavourtext: The dead one brought back to life by means other than corruption now holds the hands that revived it.

98.name: The Watcher's Watcher
98.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Wandering Eye who will drop a unique item when slain.
98.flavourtext: Unblinking, it watches. Unendingly, it is watched.

99.name: Blood of the Betrayed
99.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Kaom's Chosen in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
99.flavourtext: Slain by their king, they live only in memory, but their lust for blood remains unsated.

100.name: Heart of the Fire
100.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Solar Guard who will drop a unique item when slain.
100.flavourtext: Its one desire is to see the world burn. A shard of fury stokes the undying fire in its heart.

101.name: Notched Flesh
101.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Pocked Mason who will drop a unique item when slain.
101.flavourtext: Stiff is the bow. Brittle is the flesh that holds it. Deep are the holes it leaves.

102.name: Custodians of Silence
102.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Assault Ribbon who will drop a unique item when slain.
102.flavourtext: The temple untouched for centuries, the guardians clean and pure, yet they too must meet the Mother.

103.name: Flesh of the Beast
103.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bonewarped Warrior who will drop a unique item when slain.
103.flavourtext: Stripped of its flesh, a warrior fights to protect the piece of the beast it has carved.

104.name: Fire, Wood and Stone
104.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Cinder Elemental in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
104.flavourtext: With crushing weight, the stone figure roams the halls. It burns eternally yet grows no lighter.

105.name: Abnormal Effulgence
105.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Chaos Sentinel in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
105.flavourtext: Living stone and effulgence, nothing moves unhindered beneath the weight of its dark presence.

106.name: Wind and Thunder
106.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Galvanic Ribbon in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
106.flavourtext: The dreaming fabric flutters and cracks in the wind like thunder. A sharp sound that freezes the blood.

107.name: Lost in the Pages
107.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Undying Archivist in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
107.flavourtext: Hundreds of years with nothing but books twists a once great mind.

108.name: Weeping Death
108.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
108.flavourtext: Striding dryly through the mud, yet dripping with rot, he waits for the Mother's touch.

109.name: The Flayed Man
109.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Gut Flayer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
109.flavourtext: The flayed becomes the flayer, stripping flesh from muscle with a sharpened edge.

110.name: The Hollow Pledge
110.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Tunneler in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
110.flavourtext: Grasping blindly through a dark dream, a final pledge turns brittle flesh to dust.

111.name: A Call into the Void
111.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Talon Archer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
111.flavourtext: The dreaming cockerel crows thrice, and thunder bellows from the void.

112.name: Blood in the Eyes
112.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
112.flavourtext: Blood stains the fighter's eyes and rains upon the dirt. He sees and dreams in crimson.

113.name: The Nest
113.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Noxious Tarantula in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
113.flavourtext: Rats become tangled in the spider's web; a meal within a nest within a dream.

114.name: The Brothers of Necromancy
114.predictiontext: You will encounter four necromancers with their undead minions and slay them all.
114.flavourtext: Four of shared flesh and blood raise an army of borrowed blood and bone.

115.name: Reforged Bonds
115.flavourtext: A bond of blood breaks, but from the carnage new bonds may be formed.

116.name: Overflowing Riches
116.predictiontext: You will slay a foe who erupts into currency.
116.flavourtext: A full pocket, severed, spills forth like a struck spring.

117.name: The Plaguemaw I
117.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful golem in a Vaal side area and defeat it.
117.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw enters the red realm and leaves a swirling mass of living stone.

118.name: The Plaguemaw II
118.predictiontext: You will encounter shadowy monsters in the Crypt and slay them.
118.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw's followers feed on the flesh of the dead; a desecration of the Mother's work.

119.name: The Plaguemaw III
119.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by The Plaguemaw's followers after you kill a certain very powerful monster.
119.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw watches you with a glistening grin, waiting for a moment to send his shadows.

120.name: The Plaguemaw IV
120.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by The Plaguemaw's followers in the Hedge Maze.
120.flavourtext: In a maze of green, the Plaguemaw sets a trap baited with treasures.

121.name: The Plaguemaw V
121.predictiontext: You will enter the Plaguemaw's chamber in the Crystal Veins or in a Crystal Ore Map.
121.flavourtext: A room, etched in crystal, plays home to the Plaguemaw. He awaits you.

122.name: Thaumaturgical History I
122.predictiontext: You will read Shavronne's Journal in the Warden's Quarters.
122.flavourtext: The Aesthete's monstrous techniques are protected by the shadows.

123.name: Thaumaturgical History II
123.predictiontext: You will read Doedre's Proclamation in The Western Forest.
123.flavourtext: The Tongueless Witch's words speak through the stone to desperate followers.

124.name: Thaumaturgical History III
124.predictiontext: You will inspect the Ancient Reverie Device in the Chamber of Sins.
124.flavourtext: The Soulless One's gift to the Prodigy draws forth those who seek the same unnatural power.

125.name: Thaumaturgical History IV
125.predictiontext: You will read Malachai's Dedication in The Harvest.
125.flavourtext: Where the Soulless One left his physical form behind, a dangerous new threat emerges.

126.name: The Pirate's Den
126.predictiontext: You will slay Belcer, the Pirate Lord, and he will open portals to Mao Kun.
126.flavourtext: The pirate lord who hides in dank tunnels deep in dream will guide you to an island of treasure.

127.name: Enter the Maelström
127.predictiontext: You will slay Void Anomaly and he will open portals to Maelström of Chaos.
127.flavourtext: The swirling mass of dark stone stands at the centre of the dreaming storm.

128.name: Sanctum of Stone
128.predictiontext: You will slay The Idol Beyond and he will open portals to Olmec's Sanctum
128.flavourtext: Break apart the wooden god, and a door to the stone sanctum appears.

129.name: Through the Mirage
129.predictiontext: You will slay Mirage of Bones and he will open portals to a mirror world.
129.flavourtext: Washing away the mirage unveils a parallel path to walk.

130.name: Ancient Rivalries I
130.predictiontext: You will slay Brutus while wearing one of Shavronne's items.
130.flavourtext: Her greatest creation failed her. The Aesthete seeks to punish the brute.

131.name: Ancient Rivalries II
131.predictiontext: You will slay Voll while wearing one of Doedre's items.
131.flavourtext: Burned at the stake, the Tongueless Witch seeks to purify the purifier.

132.name: Ancient Rivalries III
132.predictiontext: You will slay Kaom while wearing one of Lioneye's items.
132.flavourtext: Cut down on the shores, the Lion's fangs will sink into the Betraying King's flesh one last time.

133.name: Ancient Rivalries IV
133.predictiontext: You will slay Malachai while wearing one of Victario's items.
133.flavourtext: The Soulless One tore the world asunder, but the Poet will have the final word.

134.name: The Feral Lord I
134.predictiontext: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Southern Forest and slay them.
134.flavourtext: The Feral Lord in the southern wood twists the wild to his will.

135.name: The Feral Lord II
135.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful beast in the Northern Forest and slay it.
135.flavourtext: The Feral Lord's cold breath imbues and empowers the beast in the northern wood.

136.name: The Feral Lord III
136.predictiontext: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Dried Lake and slay them.
136.flavourtext: Where water shimmers no more, thunderous beasts are dragged into the Feral Lord's domain.

137.name: The Feral Lord IV
137.predictiontext: You will discover and slay a very powerful Vulture within Sarn's borders.
137.flavourtext: The Feral Lord senses your presence. In the shell of the snail, the vulture seeks a fresh carcass.

138.name: The Feral Lord V
138.predictiontext: You will discover and slay a very powerful fiery Rhoa in a Mud Geyser map.
138.flavourtext: To the realm of dreams the Feral Lord flees, and leaves in his wake a burning nightmare.

139.name: Plague of Rats
139.predictiontext: You will discover a series of indoor chambers flooded with rats.
139.flavourtext: They run, they bite, they flee, they die. Swarms of fur and teeth and tail drown each and every room.

140.name: Anarchy's End I
140.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay a Rogue Exile who is carrying a Divination Card.
140.flavourtext: A criminal of Theopolis flees into dream carrying a fortuneteller's tool.

141.name: Anarchy's End II
141.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay two Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
141.flavourtext: Two criminals carry the fortuneteller's tools as they hunt for the body of their dreaming ally.

142.name: Anarchy's End III
142.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay four Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
142.flavourtext: A party of four criminals, each with the mark of the fortuneteller, hunt through dreams for their prosecutor.

143.name: Anarchy's End IV
143.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay six Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
143.flavourtext: Six criminals take to foot to stamp out the threat that tracks them through dreams.

144.name: Twice Enchanted
144.predictiontext: You will be rewarded with two uses of the Enchantment Device on completing the Labyrinth
144.flavourtext: A golden device hidden by a rotting emperor overflows with power.

145.name: An Unseen Peril
145.predictiontext: You will be attacked by stronger than normal monsters when opening a Strongbox.
145.flavourtext: A trap is set, a lure is placed, but stronger foes lie in wait.

146.name: Mysterious Invaders
146.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
146.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

147.name: Mysterious Invaders
147.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
147.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

148.name: Mysterious Invaders
148.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
148.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

149.name: Mysterious Invaders
149.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
149.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

150.name: Mysterious Invaders
150.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
150.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

151.name: Undead Uprising
151.predictiontext: You will travel to the Old Fields, where you will encounter and slay an army of the undead.
151.flavourtext: The green and verdant field is swathed in night, the farmers who tended to it rise again.

152.name: Day of Sacrifice I
152.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful Vaal Fallen who will drop a Sacrifice at Dawn fragment.
152.flavourtext: The ancient red champion is fallen, but a killing blow reveals his final sacrifice beneath the morning sun.

153.name: Day of Sacrifice II
153.predictiontext: You will open a corrupted rare strongbox that will contain a Sacrifice at Noon fragment.
153.flavourtext: Beneath the midday sun, treasure, stained by corruption, invites an ambush.

154.name: Day of Sacrifice III
154.predictiontext: You will enter a difficult Vaal side area that contains an additional Sacrifice at Dusk fragment.
154.flavourtext: The ancient red army opens a powerful path before the setting sun.

155.name: Day of Sacrifice IV
155.predictiontext: You will encounter an invading foe in a rare, corrupted map, who will drop a Sacrifice at Midnight fragment.
155.flavourtext: A corrupted dream invites an invader, who hunts in the deepest night.

156.name: The Blessing
156.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe, and gain a shrine's blessing.
156.flavourtext: Malevolence swells and spreads in minds. The flesh is weak, but the gift is strong.

157.name: Hunter's Lesson
157.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe and gain its powers.
157.flavourtext: An adversary, slain, briefly lives on in the lessons taught to the slayer.

158.name: Gilded Within
158.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe and it will drop a rare item.
158.flavourtext: Gold without, gold within. Blood comes in many colours, but the gilded always bleed gold.

159.name: Erased from Memory
159.predictiontext: You will slay a very powerful foe and it will drop an Orb of Scouring.
159.flavourtext: A foe feared for an aeon falls and is scoured from the pages of history.

160.name: Ending the Torment
160.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe who will release a Tormented Spirit.
160.flavourtext: A fearsome foe's inner torment spills out into the world.

161.name: Hidden Reinforcements
161.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by several enemies upon slaying a foe.
161.flavourtext: Cowardly foes lay in wait. A show of force reveals their true intentions.

162.name: Rebirth
162.predictiontext: You will slay a normal foe, who will be resurrected and granted new power.
162.flavourtext: An ordinary life, an ordinary death, marked by an extraordinary rebirth.

163.name: The Sharpened Blade
163.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of a weapon with a single Blacksmith's Whetstone.
163.flavourtext: The metal softens beneath the stone, reshaping with great ease.

164.name: The Hardened Armour
164.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of an armour piece with a single Armourer's Scrap
164.flavourtext: The rings that bind grow tighter, the plate thicker, the leather denser, all with a single touch.

165.name: Golden Touch
165.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an item and it will grant extra mods.
165.flavourtext: Blue tendrils entangle and change. All that remains is gold.

166.name: Vital Transformation
166.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring or amulet and it will gain a life mod.
166.flavourtext: Blue tendrils envelop, breathing life into the beautifully inert.

167.name: Resistant to Change
167.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring, shield, or amulet, and it will gain resistances.
167.flavourtext: Wreathed in blue sinew, it is protected from the flames, the storms and the snow alike.

168.name: Touched by the Wind
168.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a pair of boots and it will gain movement speed.
168.flavourtext: Stitched with blue thread, a swift boot covers great distances.

169.name: The Pair
169.predictiontext: You will slay a foe and it will drop two Divination cards.
169.flavourtext: One carries the fortune teller's mark, not knowing that a second surprise lies with it.

170.name: The Beautiful Guide
170.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of a map with a single Cartographer's Chisel.
170.flavourtext: A single tap from the chisel, and the guide's marks grow far clearer.

171.name: Kalandra's Craft
171.predictiontext: You will slay a foe who drops four identical rare items.
171.flavourtext: A grand treasure fractures like a dropped mirror, yet somehow goes unharmed.

172.name: Smothering Tendrils
172.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a map and it will gain a smothering atmosphere.
172.flavourtext: Blue tendrils wrap around the markings, constricting and smothering the stone beneath.

173.name: Bountiful Traps
173.predictiontext: You will enter a map that holds six additional Strongboxes.
173.flavourtext: In a distant dream, six traps with the promise of treasure wait to be sprung.

174.name: The Four Feral Exiles
174.predictiontext: You will find four Rogue Exiles in a map and slay them.
174.flavourtext: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

175.name: Deadly Twins
175.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay the Twinned bosses in it.
175.flavourtext: In a long-lost dream, one deadly foe becomes two.

176.name: Lasting Impressions
176.predictiontext: You will read something written long ago.
176.flavourtext: A hand scrawls on a wall, or carves into bone, a tale that undoes the world and teaches those who come after.

177.name: Fire from the Sky
177.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Infernal Tempest
177.flavourtext: Fire rains down across the land. Beware the path you take.

178.name: Ice from Above
178.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Arctic Tempest
178.flavourtext: The cold blusters from above, chilling the unwary to the bone.

179.name: Lightning Falls
179.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Electrocuting Tempest
179.flavourtext: The storms above strike with precision. A deft foot will avoid the blows.

180.name: The Undead Storm
180.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Morbid Tempest
180.flavourtext: Bones fall from the sky and take the shape of the men they once were.

181.name: Crushing Squall
181.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Crushing Tempest
181.flavourtext: The sky trembles and the ground below answers with crushing force.

182.name: Vaal Winds
182.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Corrupting Tempest
182.flavourtext: Corruption is carried on a red wind, and spreads to all who are touched.

183.name: Living Fires
183.predictiontext: You will discover a powerful fire golem at Fire Fury's camp in The Coast.
183.flavourtext: Where the sand meets the water, the flesheater's flames shine brighter and brighter still.

184.name: Fallow At Last
184.predictiontext: You will fight waves of risen farmers amongst the ruins of a house in Crossroads.
184.flavourtext: The farmer's time came long ago, his ruined home the site of a dark harvest.

185.name: Path of Betrayal
185.predictiontext: You will encounter Karui Spirits near Weathered Carvings, and send them back to Hinekora.
185.flavourtext: Cut down by the king's hand, southern spirits linger near the bones of giants.

186.name: The Forgotten Soldiers
186.predictiontext: You will encounter the risen weapons of a fallen army around Lioneye's Standard in The Climb.
186.flavourtext: The banner in the breeze marks the resting place of lions, whose metal fangs still thirst for blood.

187.name: Pools of Wealth
187.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay golden elementals deep in the Cavern of Anger.
187.flavourtext: Beckoned by the Siren's song, wrathful gold rises from the ground.

188.name: The Child of Lunaris
188.predictiontext: Near the Crossroads, you will encounter the Child of Lunaris in the ruins of a temple, and slay it.
188.flavourtext: The light of Lunaris shines on her child who walks in stone shrine's ruins.

189.name: The Forgotten Garrison
189.predictiontext: Near the Broken Bridge, you will encounter and slay an army of undead in the ruins of the fortress.
189.flavourtext: Where bandits have taken hold, a lifeless army rises to guard the ruined fortress.

190.name: The Stockkeeper
190.predictiontext: You will encounter the Stockkeeper at the Grain Gate and slay him.
190.flavourtext: A man survives only by his greed, but a single weapon cuts down the man who has many.

191.name: Unnatural Energy
191.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful Lightning Elemental near the Battlefront bridge.
191.flavourtext: Unnatural energies hold those in black at bay, but the barrier bends for crackling kin.

192.name: Holding the Bridge
192.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay two powerful Blackguard captains near the Ebony Barracks bridge.
192.flavourtext: Where those in black swarm across the stone steps, one's blood runs cold with hatred and one's eyes crackle with wrath.

193.name: In the Grasp of Corruption
193.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful undead Blackguard in the Imperial Gardens.
193.flavourtext: A soldier in black's journey is cut short at the foot of the tower. The flesh rots, but the bone grows yet.

194.name: Defiled in the Sceptre
194.predictiontext: You will encounter a group of strong miscreations in the Upper Sceptre of God, and slay them all.
194.flavourtext: Stolen from their homes, innocent flesh is twisted and shaped atop the tower.

195.name: The Lost Maps
195.predictiontext: You will find maps near the centre of the Chamber of Sins.
195.flavourtext: A device of great power once held by the prodigy spills forth the keys to new worlds.

196.name: The Twins
196.predictiontext: You will encounter an area where powerful monsters are duplicated.
196.flavourtext: What was one is now two. The strong find greater strength in numbers.

197.name: Possessed Foe
197.predictiontext: You will encounter one or more very powerful monsters possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
197.flavourtext: A name remembered all this time, their will stolen by a vengeful spirit.

198.name: Touched by Death
198.predictiontext: You will kill a Tormented Spirit who then touches all other monsters. - NOTE: Currently very laggy
198.flavourtext: A tormented soul makes one final grasp at vengeance.

199.name: Vaal Invasion
199.predictiontext: You will find Vaal invaders in the Temple of Lunaris and destroy the monster who is leading them.
199.flavourtext: At the site of a great atrocity, the shadows of the distant past hang over the risen red army.

200.name: Monstrous Treasure
200.predictiontext: You will travel to a map where the monsters lie in wait, open the boxes they guard, and slay them all.
200.flavourtext: In a long lost dream, great foes hide in tiny boxes, but so do great rewards.

201.name: The Spread of Corruption
201.predictiontext: You will find and cleanse a location where the corruption of the Vaal has spread.
201.flavourtext: Corruption spreads thick and fast, so too do those who revere it.

202.name: Plague of Frogs
202.predictiontext: You will discover an outdoor location flooded with frogs.
202.flavourtext: Wet and slippery flesh, clinging feet and tongue. No matter the colour before, now the earth is green.

203.name: Visions of the Drowned
203.predictiontext: You will find an area littered with the drowned.
203.flavourtext: Damp and bloated with water and goods. Sometimes treasure washes ashore.

204.name: The Dream Trial
204.predictiontext: You will discover a Trial of Ascendancy in a map.
204.flavourtext: The depths of a dream hide a gauntlet that sharpens the body and mind.

205.name: Soil, Worms and Blood
205.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Undead monsters.
205.flavourtext: The unliving crowd into the dwellings of unlikely allies.

206.name: The Hungering Swarm
206.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Insects.
206.flavourtext: Skittering across the ground, insects nest near unlikely allies.

207.name: The Cursed Choir
207.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Sea Witches.
207.flavourtext: The sea witch whispers sweet nothings, and calms the hearts of unlikely allies.

208.name: The Trembling Earth
208.predictiontext: You will discover an area with many Devourers.
208.flavourtext: The earth shifts beneath the feet of many, but they are not the prey this monster seeks.

209.name: The Invader
209.predictiontext: You will encounter a very powerful invading monster and slay it.
209.flavourtext: A horror from the past returns to cause pain in a place that it never called home.

210.name: Unbearable Whispers I
210.predictiontext: You will discover a tome in the Library.
210.flavourtext: Dark runes skitter across the pages of the tome, concealing the Whisperer's allies.

211.name: Unbearable Whispers II
211.predictiontext: You will discover a tome upon slaying a monster in the Sceptre of God.
211.flavourtext: The Whisperer leaves a tome in the tower, held by a maddened follower.

212.name: Unbearable Whispers III
212.predictiontext: You will slay Shavronne, and she will drop a tome.
212.flavourtext: The Aesthete holds the Whisperer's forbidden words safe, deep in the beast's belly.

213.name: Unbearable Whispers IV
213.predictiontext: You will slay a certain powerful monster and it will drop a tome.
213.flavourtext: Forbidden words ring in the ears of the powerful; the Whisperer's influence spreads.

214.name: Unbearable Whispers V
214.predictiontext: You will discover a dangerous tome in the final chamber of the Labyrinth.
214.flavourtext: The trapped emperor unknowingly protects foul knowledge. Dark pages amongst bright treasures.

215.name: The Unbreathing Queen I
215.predictiontext: You will encounter spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins and slay them.
215.flavourtext: The Unbreathing Queen masterminds an unholy heist, a defilement of the dead.

216.name: The Unbreathing Queen II
216.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Lord's Labyrinth and defeat it.
216.flavourtext: The flesh is taken by the Unbreathing Queen. But the hero's soul, bitter and cold, remains trapped in the Emperor's greatest trial.

217.name: The Unbreathing Queen III
217.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Beacon and defeat it
217.flavourtext: Water crashes against stone; A victim of the Unbreathing Queen burns with desire for The Mother's domain.

218.name: The Unbreathing Queen IV
218.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Temple of Decay and defeat it.
218.flavourtext: A tangle of web trapped the body, now stolen. The Unbreathing Queen leaves behind a sorrowful soul whose howls thunder through the halls.

219.name: The Unbreathing Queen V
219.predictiontext: You will defeat the Unbreathing Queen in a Cemetery map.
219.flavourtext: The Unbreathing Queen raises an army in a dream of tombs and graves. She knows you are coming.

220.name: The Ambitious Bandit I
220.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in an area where they do not ordinarily appear.
220.flavourtext: A bandit's ambition grows, and so too does the path it walks.

221.name: The Ambitious Bandit II
221.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Marketplace.
221.flavourtext: A bandit seeks a relic for the greedy where greed was once a great virtue.

222.name: The Ambitious Bandit III
222.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Library.
222.flavourtext: Where relics and tomes gather dust, a bandit's eyes see great value.

223.name: Deadly Rivalry I
223.predictiontext: You will encounter a rival Exile imbued with Nemesis powers.
223.flavourtext: You draw the ire of another, imbued with golden power.

224.name: Deadly Rivalry II
224.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now also imbued with Onslaught.
224.flavourtext: Their defeat will not stand, renewed and fueled by blind rage.

225.name: Deadly Rivalry III
225.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
225.flavourtext: Their body broken and mended, now a conduit for a greater power.

226.name: Deadly Rivalry IV
226.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now imbued with the powers of a Shrine
226.flavourtext: Prayer at a dark altar mends torn flesh once again, but darkness still fills the soul. Each defeat feeds their determination.

227.name: Deadly Rivalry V
227.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now backed by others of a shared Bloodline.
227.flavourtext: Allies arrive for a final battle, filled with shared blood. The breaking and mending takes its toll.

228.name: The Warmongers I
228.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands.
228.flavourtext: A vanguard seeks to claim land that is not theirs.

229.name: The Warmongers II
229.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their reinforcements.
229.flavourtext: The vanguard did not return, so more have followed their path, bringing war with them.

230.name: The Warmongers III
230.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their elite soldiers.
230.flavourtext: Failure twice draws the ire of higher ranking soldiers. They come to spill blood.

231.name: The Warmongers IV
231.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their leader.
231.flavourtext: The leader arrives, and lays plans to paint the land red with your blood.

232.name: Beyond Sight I
232.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the foes they summon.
232.flavourtext: A dark presence hides just out of sight. Only bodies betray its movements.

233.name: Beyond Sight II
233.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
233.flavourtext: A visible following forms around an invisible foe. It grows greater yet remains veiled.

234.name: Beyond Sight III
234.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
234.flavourtext: Monsters not of this world spill forth. Only shapes and movement. A warped vision.

235.name: Beyond Sight IV
235.predictiontext: You will slay the Herald of Bameth and the very powerful foe it summons.
235.flavourtext: My vision grows dark. A horror draws near. Its soul would be a treasured prize for Hinekora.

236.name: The Fortune Teller's Collection
236.predictiontext: You will find a chest containing Divination Cards in a map.
236.flavourtext: The dreaming seeker finds what a fortune teller forgets.
